library.name: Xbesh UI
library.description: A comprehensive UI component library for modern web applications, offering a wide range of customizable and accessible components.

components.name: Button
components.description: A highly customizable button component for user interactions.

components.name: Toggle
components.description: A simple on/off toggle switch for binary settings or options.

components.name: ToggleGroup
components.description: A group of toggle buttons, allowing multiple selections.

components.name: Avatar
components.description: A component to represent a user or entity, typically an image or initials.

components.name: Image
components.description: A component for displaying images with support for lazy loading and placeholders.

components.name: BackgroundImage
components.description: A component for setting a background image with options for positioning, sizing, and styling.

components.name: Badge
components.description: A small status indicator for notifications, counts, or labels.

components.name: Calendar
components.description: A component for displaying dates and allowing users to select dates from a calendar interface.

components.name: RangeCalendar
components.description: A calendar component for selecting a range of dates.

components.name: Card
components.description: A container component for grouping related content with a consistent style.

components.name: DataTable
components.description: A component for displaying data in a tabular format, with support for sorting, filtering, and pagination.

components.name: List
components.description: A component for displaying lists of items, such as bullet or numbered lists.

components.name: Label
components.description: A component for adding labels to inputs in forms for better accessibility.

components.name: Skeleton
components.description: A placeholder component used while content is loading to improve user experience.

components.name: Table
components.description: A component for displaying rows of data and content in a structured format.

components.name: Alert
components.description: Use for contextual feedback messages for typical user actions.

components.name: AlertDialog
components.description: A modal dialog that interrupts the user's workflow to provide information or ask for input.

components.name: Sonner
components.description: A notification component, typically used to display temporary, auto-hiding alerts or messages.

components.name: Toast
components.description: A component for displaying brief, auto-hiding messages in a floating overlay.

components.name: Checkbox
components.description: An input component used to select one or more options from a set.

components.name: Combobox
components.description: A text input with a dropdown list of options for autocomplete or selection.

components.name: DropdownMenu
components.description: A component that allows users to choose one value from a list.

components.name: Form
components.description: A component for collecting user input, with support for validation and submission handling.

components.name: Input
components.description: A basic input component for user text input.

components.name: RadioGroup
components.description: A set of radio buttons for selecting one option from many.

components.name: Select
components.description: A dropdown component for selecting one or multiple values from a list.

components.name: MultiSelect
components.description: A component for selecting multiple options from a dropdown list.

components.name: Slider
components.description: A component for selecting a single value or a range from a specified interval.

components.name: Switch
components.description: A toggle switch component for switching between two states or options.

components.name: Textarea
components.description: A multi-line text input component for longer user inputs.

components.description: An input component used to select one or more options from a set.

components.name: Combobox
components.description: A text input with a dropdown list of options for autocomplete or selection.

components.name: DropdownMenu
components.description: A component that allows users to choose one value from a list.

components.name: Input

components.name: RadioGroup
components.description: A set of radio buttons for selecting one option from many.

components.name: Select
components.description: A dropdown component for selecting one or multiple values from a list.

components.name: Slider
components.description: A component for selecting a single value or a range from a specified interval.

components.name: Switch
components.description: A toggle switch component for switching between two states or options.

components.name: Textarea
components.description: A multi-line text input component for longer user inputs.

components.name: Toggle
components.description: A simple on/off toggle switch for binary settings or options.

components.name: ToggleGroup
components.description: A group of toggle buttons, allowing multiple selections.

components.name: AspectRatio
components.description: A component to enforce a specific aspect ratio for its children.

components.name: Drawer
components.description: A panel that slides out from the edge of the screen, typically used to enter or navigate information.

components.name: Menubar
components.description: A component for creating a horizontal menu bar, commonly used for navigation purposes.

components.name: NavigationMenu
components.description: A component for site navigation, typically displayed as a vertical list of links.

components.name: Sheet
components.description: A component that slides in from the bottom of the screen, typically used for mobile-responsive menus or modals.

components.name: Tabs
components.description: A component for creating tabbed interfaces, allowing users to switch between different views or datasets.

components.name: Command
components.description: A component that triggers a specific action or command.

components.name: Separator
components.description: A visual or thematic separator for content, often used in menus or lists.

components.name: Accordion
components.description: A versatile accordion component for displaying collapsible content panels.

components.name: Tabs
components.description: A component for creating tabbed interfaces, allowing users to switch between different views or datasets.

components.name: AlertDialog
components.description: A modal dialog that interrupts the user's workflow to provide information or ask for input.

components.name: Dialog
components.description: A dialog component for modal interactions, requiring users to respond before continuing.

components.name: Drawer
components.description: A panel that slides out from the edge of the screen, typically used to enter or navigate information.

components.name: Popover
components.description: A small, contextual overlay that opens on demand, perfect for housing secondary information.

components.name: Sheet
components.description: A component that slides in from the bottom of the screen, typically used for mobile-responsive menus or modals.

components.name: Tooltip
components.description: A small, floating box that appears when a user hovers over an element, providing additional information.

components.name: Tooltip
components.description: A small, floating box that appears when a user hovers over an element, providing additional information.

components.name: Blockquote
components.description: A component for displaying a quotation in a stylized format, commonly used in articles or blogs.

components.name: Code
components.description: A component for displaying code snippets with syntax highlighting and line numbering.

components.name: Label
components.description: A component for labeling or categorizing content, often used in forms.

components.name: Text
components.description: A component for displaying plain text content with support for text formatting and styling.

components.name: Title
components.description: A component for displaying a title or heading with various levels of hierarchy.
